about:
Hey guys, Hypershmitty here! I make Minecraft videos and play on this server, as well as many others, like: mc.happy-hg.com, and hivemc.eu. I  also have a website, but it is still in development. If you want to keep tabs on me and my website, here's the URL. www.hypershmitty.com. Sorry the link isn't active. Anyway, I will also be coming out with a YouTube channel, but that won't be for another 3-4 months. If you want to face off against me in Super Craft Brothers, visit the mc.happy-hg.com server on weekends. Also, Agent_Ender_Man is a friend of mine. My name is 
Hypershmitty, and I've gotta go. Peace!
